title: Raiders Gonna Raid
description:
Mina and Charles McDonald of For the Win on USA Today look ahead to the first ever Week 18- who wins and who goes home between the Chargers and Raiders, who should the Patriots be trying to avoid in the postseason, can the 49ers get a win against the Rams despite a barren secondary, and can the Falcons end the Saints' season?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
